qcfpunch:Defend_Weakest.NAME: “最强流”防御
qcfpunch:Defend_Weakest.DESCRIPTION: 虚无 。 NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 消耗。

qcfpunch:ErrorCard.NAME: Error!
qcfpunch:ErrorCard.DESCRIPTION: Something almost crashed the game involving the Quarter Circle Punch FORWARD mod. Can you inform the mod's creator about it? Thanks!

qcfpunch:Finished.NAME: Finished
qcfpunch:Finished.DESCRIPTION: Enough choices were made by now.

qcfpunch:Strike_Weakest.NAME: “最强流”打击
qcfpunch:Strike_Weakest.DESCRIPTION: 虚无 。 NL 造成 !D! 点 伤害 。 NL 消耗。

qcfpunch:WeakestEnergyBlast.DESCRIPTION: 虚无 。 NL 造成 !D! 点 伤害 。 NL 获得 1/3  qcfpunch:怒气槽 。  NL 消耗。

qcfpunch:WeakestFlyingKick.NAME: “最强流”断空腿
qcfpunch:WeakestFlyingKick.DESCRIPTION: 虚无 。 NL 造成 !D! 点 伤害 。 NL 消耗。

qcfpunch:WeakestProvocation.DESCRIPTION: 虚无 。 NL 给予 1 层 易伤 。 NL 获得 1/3 qcfpunch:怒气槽 。 NL 消耗。

qcfpunch:WeakestTaunt.NAME: “最强流”嘲讽
qcfpunch:WeakestTaunt.DESCRIPTION: 虚无 。 NL 给予 1 层 虚弱 。 NL Gain 1/3 qcfpunch:怒气槽 。 NL 消耗。
